charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 120 months as to Count 1 of the Indictment and 130 months as to Count 2 of the Indictment, such terms to run concurrent, for a total term of 130 months; Supervised Release: 3 years as to each of Counts 1 and 2 of the Indictment, such terms to run concurrent, for a total term of 3 years; Special Assessment: $200.00.

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F  CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 120 months as to Count 1 of the Indictment and 130 months as to Count 2 of the Indictment, such terms to run concurrent, for a total term of 130 months; Supervised Release: 3 years as to each of Counts 1 and 2 of the Indictment, such terms to run concurrent, for a total term of 3 years; Special Assessment: $200.00.
